attributes.additional_details: Boris Johnson is a liar and holds all the values that should not be present in a Government of the British people. Never can a word be trusted that passes his lips.
attributes.background: Remove Boris Johnson from any Government Position and bar him from ever gaining a position within government again.

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes calling for Ministers or MPs to be sacked, resign, or to be subject to a recall vote or a vote of no confidence.
